Input.Description: Filter w/ constant value, camelcase = True

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE (root["numericFieldDataMember"] = 1)

Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with constant value, camelcase = True

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE (root = {"NumericFieldDataMember": 1, "StringFieldDataMember": "1", "id": null, "Pk": null})

Input.Description: Select w/ DataObject initializer, camelcase = True

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE {"NumericFieldDataMember": 1, "StringFieldDataMember": "1", "id": null, "Pk": null} FROM root

Input.Description: Deeper than top level reference, camelcase = True
Input.Expression: query.Select(doc => IIF((doc.NumericField > 1), new DataObjectDataMember() {NumericField = 1, StringField = "1"}, new DataObjectDataMember() {NumericField = 1, StringField = "1"}))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ((root["numericFieldDataMember"] > 1) ? {"NumericFieldDataMember": 1, "StringFieldDataMember": "1", "id": null, "Pk": null} : {"NumericFieldDataMember": 1, "StringFieldDataMember": "1", "id": null, "Pk": null}) FROM root

Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with member initialization, camelcase = True
Input.Expression: query.Where(doc => (doc == new DataObjectDataMember() {NumericField = doc.NumericField, StringField = doc.StringField})).Select(b => "A")

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE "A" FROM root WHERE (root = {"numericFieldDataMember": root["numericFieldDataMember"], "stringFieldDataMember": root["stringFieldDataMember"]})

Input.Description: Filter w/ constant value, camelcase = False

Input.Expression: query.Select(doc => IIF((doc.NumericField > 1), new DataObjectDataMember() {NumericField = 1, StringField = "1"}, new DataObjectDataMember() {NumericField = 1, StringField = "1"}))

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ((root["NumericFieldDataMember"] > 1) ? {"NumericFieldDataMember": 1, "StringFieldDataMember": "1", "id": null, "Pk": null} : {"NumericFieldDataMember": 1, "StringFieldDataMember": "1", "id": null, "Pk": null}) FROM root

Input.Description: Filter w/ DataObject initializer with member initialization, camelcase = False
Input.Expression: query.Where(doc => (doc == new DataObjectDataMember() {NumericField = doc.NumericField, StringField = doc.StringField})).Select(b => "A")

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE "A" FROM root WHERE (root = {"NumericFieldDataMember": root["NumericFieldDataMember"], "StringFieldDataMember": root["StringFieldDataMember"]})
